üçïPresented with the original synchronized orchestral score and sound effectsüçï
Step into the shadowy world of jungle intrigue and forbidden love in this intense pre-Code drama from Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. Directed by the legendary Tod Browning, this atmospheric tale stars Lon Chaney as a fierce animal trapper whose troubled past collides with his daughter's future. Lupe V√©lez delivers a fiery performance as the devoted daughter, while Estelle Taylor stuns as a dangerously seductive figure from their past.

Produced by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and set against a backdrop of Southeast Asian mystique, this film explores themes of obsession, betrayal, and the primal forces of nature and desire. With Browning‚Äôs signature blend of melodrama and menace, the story unfolds with emotional intensity and striking visual style. Chaney‚Äôs powerful presence and V√©lez‚Äôs charm drive a narrative that remains riveting nearly a century later.
